entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to snow this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023
